name: My Choice Roasted Curry Powder
description: Curry Powder is a mixture of roasted traditional Sri Lankan flavors which predominantly includes coriander, turmeric, cumin, chili powder, curry leaves, ginger, mustard, and other condiments including cinnamon, cardamon, etc. Roasted curry powder is heavily used in dark curries especially for meat and fish.*Images for illustration purpose only,Product recieved may vary.
